message:
“We’re honored Chief Hall will make her first public appearance at our event. The community policing and mentor programs she created in Detroit demonstrate how law enforcement can balance concerns for safety and justice through partnership and dialogue,” says SMU Embrey Human Rights Program Associate Director Bradley Klein. 
 #HelpErase #HumanTrafficking #CreatingChange @DallasPD

data.description: DALLAS, TX – (SMU) New Dallas Police Department Chief U. Renee Hall will give her first public speech at 1 p.m. Thursday, Sept. 14, at SMU. She will speak during “Protecting Our Daughters and Sons,”…
data.title: DPD Chief Renee Hall Speaks at Sex Trafficking Survivors Event
